example.parse: (S (CONJP (CONJ و) (CONJ لكن)) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يستحيل) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV1S+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S اضع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG حيات) (NP (POSS_PRON_1S ي))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN_POSS يدي) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN شخص) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN آخر)))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: that I will put my life between the hand of another person

example.arg: ان اضع * حيات ي بين يدي شخص آخر
